root.name: MazeFinger
root.description: OverviewNGmoco's Maze Finger is the addictive puzzle game that puts your finger against crazy mazes and also everyones worst enemy, time. To play Maze Finger you put your finger on the the lightning bolt and move around the maze indicated on your screen. When you reach harder levels you need to time when to start because at certaint moments red blocks appear to block your finger from progressing through the level.
